channel.title: Donna Marie on Transcripts of Iriss.fm
channel.description: Recent content in Donna Marie on Transcripts of Iriss.fm

item.title: The Life I Want
item.description: MM - Michael McEwan DM - Donna Marie MM So on this episode of Iriss.fm we are going to hear about a new project called ‘The Life I Want’, and where I went to speak to Donna Marie. Donna Marie is the coordinator for ‘The Life I Want’. So tell us about ‘The Life I Want’ and why is it important for people with a learning disability? DM Well, ‘The Life I Want’ is a partnership in Greater Glasgow and Clyde.
